text: Myraa Sareen (born 5 November 1999) is an Indian actress, entrepreneur, and DJ. She made her acting debut in Telugu film industry with the film Officer alongside Nagarjuna and later starred in Bollywood films and made her debut with Riwaz. She is also a trained dancer and has expertise in various adventure sports. == Early life and education == Myraa Sareen was born on 5 November 1999 in Faridabad, Haryana, India. She completed her graduation with a bachelor's degree in DJing. From a young age, she developed a passion for performing arts, including acting, dance, and music. She trained in multiple dance forms such as belly dance, Kathak, salsa, and Bollywood dance. Additionally, she has skills in horse riding, mountaineering, and motorcycle riding. == Career == Myraa Sareen made her film debut with the Telugu film Officer, directed by Ram Gopal Varma and starring Nagarjuna. After the COVID-19 lockdown, she starred in Mystery of Tattoo, which was shot in London. The film featured a cast including Arjun Rampal, Daisy Shah, Manoj Joshi, Rohit Raaj, and Ameesha Patel. She later entered Bollywood with the film Riwaj, in which she played the lead role of Zainab. The film focuses on women's empowerment and the issue of triple talaq. It starred Aftab Shivdasani, Mithun Chakraborty, Jaya Prada, and Anita Raj and was released on ZEE5. Her upcoming film, Second Chance, has been completed and is set to release soon. * Moti Moti Akh * Risk * It's Natural * T10 Title Song â€“ The official title song for the T10 Cricket Leagu == References == == Other websites == Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Indian actors Category:Business people Category:People from Haryana
